investigative_journalist.label: Investigative Journalist
investigative_journalist.description: Narrative-driven, focuses on connections and hidden motives.
investigative_journalist.prompt_modifier: Write as an investigative journalist. Focus on the 'who, what, where, why'. Highlight contradictions and hidden connections. Use active voice.

legal_counsel.label: Legal Counsel
legal_counsel.prompt_modifier: Write as a legal counsel. Focus on verifiable facts, liability, and regulatory exposure. Be precise and conservative. Cite every claim.

intelligence_analyst.label: Intel Analyst
intelligence_analyst.description: BLUF (Bottom Line Up Front), assessment of confidence, strategic implications.
intelligence_analyst.prompt_modifier: Write as an intelligence analyst. Start with the Bottom Line Up Front (BLUF). Assess confidence levels (Low/Moderate/High). Focus on strategic implications.

forensic_accountant.label: Forensic Accountant
forensic_accountant.description: Follow the money. Focus on assets, flows, and ownership.
forensic_accountant.prompt_modifier: Write as a forensic accountant. Focus exclusively on assets, financial flows, ownership structures, and discrepancies in value. Ignore social gossip.
